tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is very nice as my wife got pregnant and we went there for her checkup at Artemis by Daffodils and doctor Helai Gupta treated my wife very nicely and heard our concern patiently  and understood the same. She is very friendly and explains everything in very ease and layman language.
We are very grateful that we got this doctor as she is very helpful throughout the pregnancy .
We highly recommend this doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ***** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ************* * **** **** ***. My whole pregnancy was very smooth just because of her. She is very patient and friendly. She explains everything in a way which a layman can also understand. We really thank god that we consulted Dr. Helai Gupta for our pregnancy. I will highly recommend the doctor .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review:
We approached Dr Helai Gupta in the 5th month of pregnancy at Rosewalk. We brain stormed for a day at Rosewalk on which gynecologist we should choose as there List is endless.

Previously, we had a very bad experience with a senior gynecologist at a reputed hospital in Delhi (don't want to Name any), hence this time we did not want to take any risk in choosing the right gynecologist. 

I can assure you that Dr Helai is the best gynecologist in Delhi. With Dr Helai, the entire pregancy was a smooth ride. She was always available on whatsapp, phone or any mode of communication. She was never in a rush during appointments and listened to us carefully if we had any doubts. She had a solution to all our problems and she always went in length to explain everything with patience.

My wife had a normal delivery under the guidance of Dr Helai which I guess is unheard of nowadays. The doctor has high work ethics *** *** ***** *** ******* *** *********** ***** ** ********* ****** ******* 

I am writing in length, as I want the readers to please choose the right doctor. Initially it was a very tough task to get the right gynecologist, but somehow we landed on the right page with Dr Helai by God's grace.

The doctor is not punctual and the patients have to wait unnecessarily. Further, even after giving appointments, she at times informs the Hospital that she wont be coming and the patients gain knowledge only upon reaching the hospital.

She is very rude *** ******* **** ***** ********* ** ** *** ** **** ** ********* She literally shouts over phone calls even when the patient calls to ask about why she is not coming to the hospital despite giving appointment.

Secondly if you approach her for the first time directly, she prefers taking appointments at her 2nd hospital ***** ***** which is much much expensive than Spring Meadows ****** ******* *** ************ **** ** *** ***********
Never recommending her to anyone. **** ****** ******* ********** Please re-consider.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ****** ***** *** ***** ***** ** *** **** ************* **** * **** **** She is very humble and explains everything in a very polite manner. It was because of her that my delivery was very smooth. I would highly recommend Dr Helai Gupta.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: I've known Dr. Hilai Gupta since 2009, and I can confidently say that she is an exceptional gynecologist. She played a crucial role in delivering my son and has consistently demonstrated professionalism and empathy. Dr. Gupta has a remarkable ability to put her patients at ease and provides thorough explanations of diagnoses. She strongly advocates for preventive care and consistently goes the extra mile in her patient care. She not only treats you as a patient but also as a human being, which is truly commendable. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Hilai Gupta to anyone in search of an outstanding gynecologist.

I personally find visits to medical professionals quite stressful. This has not been the case with Dr. Helai. I actually look forward to my follow up appointments with Dr. Helai knowing very well that not only will my concerns be heard but also, that I will have my doubts and questions addressed. She has always been patient with me and gone to great lengths to help me understand the status of my health, the interaction and the impact of the medication prescribed -if any. Whenever someone asks me to recommend a gynaecologist, the first name that comes to my mind is Dr. Helai. I know for a fact that regardless of the case, Dr. Helai will make the patient feel at ease and attend to a range of questions.

** ***** ***** ** ** ********* ******* She is very professional and approachable.
I was infected with Covid-19 during my pregnancy where my gynecologist refused to treat me stating that I should consult a physician. The physician too refused to treat stating that I should consult my gynae. Then I contacted Dr Helai Gupta she treated me during that time without charging me anything and answered my every little query. She always gave prompt responses to my calls & messages. She was extremely caring, supportive and kind and helped me sail through these difficult safely.
My delivery at Spring Meadows Hospital, East of Kailash, New Delhi was an enjoyable experience. This place has the best team of staff. They all were extremely courteous, helpful, compassionate, empathetic and sincere which has exceeded my expectations.
I would very much recommend her & Spring Meadows Hospital to all my friends and family.

One of the things that stood out for me was how simple Dr. Helai makes things for me to understand medical terminology and the process of examination. I don't have a medical background but Dr. Helai made the explanations of medical procedures so simple to follow. Moreover, she has always taken the time to address every concern of mine. She has always encouraged me to ask questions as she has told me on different occasions that the patient should be informed about their health so that they have the information to take health related decisions with all essential information available. I really respect that approach. After meeting with Dr. Helai, I have also encouraged my friends and family members to get routine checkup by gynaecologists.

It was a smooth & seamless expereince, *** ** * *** ****** **** great insight. she had been a pillar for my wife throughout her pregnancy and even after.  Nevertheless she is an expert with vast exp.  amalgamation of  traditional and modern thought process,  committed, to the point and crisp with her suggestions.
